RequestNext.description: Request next block from the current cardano-node's cursor.

mirror.description: An arbitrary JSON value that will be mirrored back in the response.

RequestNextResponse.description: Request next block from the current cardano-node's cursor.

reflection.description: Any value that was set by a client request in the 'mirror' field.

FindIntersect.description: Ask cardano-node to find an intersection between its local chain and the given points.

mirror.description: An arbitrary JSON value that will be mirrored back in the response.

result.description: Intersection found if any, alongside the cardano-node's current tip.

reflection.description: Any value that was set by a client request in the 'mirror' field.

SubmitTx.description: Submit a signed and serialized Utxo transaction to the network.

mirror.description: An arbitrary JSON value that will be mirrored back in the response.

reflection.description: Any value that was set by a client request in the 'mirror' field.

Acquire.description: Acquire a point on chain from which run queries.

mirror.description: An arbitrary JSON value that will be mirrored back in the response.

reflection.description: Any value that was set by a client request in the 'mirror' field.

Release.description: Release a point on chain previously acquired.

mirror.description: An arbitrary JSON value that will be mirrored back in the response.

reflection.description: Any value that was set by a client request in the 'mirror' field.

Fault.description: A fault in the JSON-WSP protocol. This is returned by the server when a request from clients is deemed invalid or, when the server was unable to reply to a well-formed request.

code.description: An error code telling about the nature of the fault.

string.description: A descriptive error message giving hints about the fault.

Address.description: A Cardano address (either legacy format or new format).

AssetQuantity.description: A number of asset, can be negative went burning assets.

BlockNo.description: A block number, the i-th block to be minted is number i.

BlockSize.description: The size of the block in bytes.

Bound.description: An era bound which captures the time, slot and epoch at which the era start. The time is relative to the start time of the network.

oneOf.description: A stake delegation certificate, from a delegator to a stake pool.
oneOf.title: stakeDelegation
moveInstantaneousRewards
oneOf.description: Either `value` or `rewards` will be present, but never both.

CompactGenesis.description: A compact (without genesis UTxO) representation of the genesis configuration.

EraMismatch.description: An era mismatch between a client request and the era the ledger is in. This may occur when running queries on a syncing node and/or when the node is crossing an era.

LeaderValue.description: In Ouroboros Praos, designate the leader's contribution to the Multi-Party computation used for calculating the leader schedule.

Lovelace.description: An amount, in Lovelace (1e6 Lovelace = 1 Ada)

LovelaceDelta.description: An amount, possibly negative, in Lovelace (1e6 Lovelace = 1 Ada).

Network.description: A network target, as defined since the Shelley era.

oneOf.description: A network target, as defined in Byron.
oneOf.title: mainnet

oneOf.description: A network target, as defined in Byron.
oneOf.title: testnet

NonMyopicMemberRewards.description: Rewards that can be expected assuming a pool is fully saturated. Such rewards are said non-myopic, in opposition to short-sighted rewards looking at immediate benefits. Keys of the map can be either Lovelace amounts or account credentials depending on the query.

OpCert.description: Certificate identifying a stake pool operator.

oneOf.description: A point on the chain, identified by a slot and a block header hash.
oneOf.title: point

oneOf.description: The origin of the blockchain. This point is special in the sense that it doesn't point to any existing slots, but is preceding any existing other point.
oneOf.title: origin

PoolDistribution.description: Distribution of stake across registered stake pools. Each key in the map corresponds to a pool id.

QueryUnavailableInCurrentEra.description: The requested query is not available in the current node era. It could be that the node is not fully synced.

Ratio.description: A ratio of two integers, to express exact fractions.

RelativeTime.description: A time in seconds relative to the system start.

RewardAccount.description: A reward account, also known as 'stake address'.

RewardPot.description: Source of rewards as defined by the protocol parameters.

Script.description: A phase-1 monetary script. Timelocks constraints are only supported since Allegra.

SubmitTxError[expiredUtxo].title: expiredUtxo
SubmitTxError[expiredUtxo].description: Only in Shelley. Replaced with 'outsideOfValidityInterval' since Allegra.
